verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--tāre āmi santuṣṭa hañā
āliṅgana kailu sarva-śakti sañcāriyā

synonyms: prabhu kahe—the Lord said; tāre—him; āmi—I; santuṣṭa hañā—being very much satisfied; āliṅgana kailu—embraced; sarva-śakti—all potencies; sañcāriyā—bestowing.
translation: The Lord said, "I was so much pleased with Rūpa Gosvāmī that I embraced him and bestowed upon him all necessary potencies for preaching the bhakti cult.
